name: Certain Grip
components: V, S, M/DF (a tiny ball of tar)
text: The subject’s grip and footing become sure, granting a +4 competence bonus on Climb checks, on Acrobatics checks to balance, and to CMD against bull rush, drag, reposition, and trip attempts. While affected by this spell, the target is also immune to the disarm combat maneuver.
components_zh: 语言, 姿势, 材料/法器 (一颗沥青球)
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh:
目标能自然的抓握和站稳，攀爬检定和用于维持平衡的特技动作检定，以及对抗冲撞、拖曳、复位和摔绊的CMD检定获得+4表现加值。

此外，法术持续时间内，目标免疫卸除武器。
